title: shopkeeper还是啥...
author: 零落Y_
txt_content:
shopkeeper可以自定义交换物品
但是商店主是村名
我想把它改成玩家
怎么改

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
然后打开shopkeeper的配置文件夹里面的config找到enable-citizen-shops: false改为true
然后召唤/shopkeepers npc就可以召唤NPC村民
详细看教程http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-661035-1-1.html

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 PY狗 于 2018-7-10 16:04 编辑 

装一个Citizens：http://ci.citizensnpcs.co/job/Citizens2/
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-797288-1-1.html
